content: I recently bought a Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra, and I'm really happy with its performance. By the way, I got it on sale for $799 at Best Buy. Anyway, back to smartwatches... I've been wearing the Fossil Gen 5 for a few days now, and it's been tracking my daily activity and sleep patterns accurately. What do you think about the Fossil Gen 5's fitness tracking features compared to the Apple Watch Series 7?
